microprocessor.name: SRC-TCP [Interface] Decouple v1.3
microprocessor.description: Connects to decouple module and connectors to decouple cars

node.label: UI
node.description: Connects to instruments or Display Controller

node.label: Decouple Front
node.description: Connects to front coupler to disconnect

node.label: Decouple Rear
node.description: Connects to rear coupler to disconnect

object.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} scroll = 0 wagon = 20 pNumWagons = 0
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press = gB(1) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
night = gB(3) nTCPFront = gB(7) nTCPRear = gB(8) --decouple = gB(4) numWagons = gN(7) masterID = gN(8) myID = gN(9)
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
minD = nTCPFront and 0 or 1 maxD = nTCPRear and numWagons or numWagons-1 numWagons2 = maxD - minD + 2 -- including non tcp cars
if not detach or updateDetach then detach = myID detach = clamp(detach,minD,maxD) end updateDetach = numWagons > pNumWagons -- reset position to my car
sDec = maxD >= minD or pDec sLeft = detach > minD or pLeft sRight = detach < maxD or pRight
if (onPress(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) or gB(5)) and detach > minD then detach = detach-1 end
if (onPress(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) or gB(6)) and detach < maxD then detach = detach+1 end
detach = clamp(detach,minD,maxD) -- is this necessary?
sN(1,detach+1) sB(1,onTouch(d.w/2-22,48,44,9)) sB(2,detach == myID or detach+1 == myID)
pNumWagons = numWagons pre = gB(1) end
function dLoco(x,y,n) dL(x+3,y,x+17,y) dL(x+3,y+8,x+17,y+8) dL(x,y+6,x+3,y+9) dL(x+17,y+8,x+20,y+5) dL(x,y+5,x+2,y+1) dL(x+18,y+2,x+20,y+6) dRF(x+2,y+1,1,1) dRF(x+17,y+1,1,1) dTB(x,y,20,9,math.floor(n),0,0) end
function dCar(x,y,n) dR(x,y,19,8) dTB(x,y,20,9,math.floor(n),0,0) setC(theme.bg2) dRF(x,y,1,1) dRF(x+19,y,1,1) end
function dnTCP(x,y,l) setC(theme.bg) dR(x,y,19,8) dTB(x,y,20,9,"x",0,0) setC(theme.bg2) dRF(l and x+19 or x,y,1,1) dR(l and x+3 or x+13,y-1,3,10) dL(l and x+1 or x+18,y,l and x+1 or x+18,y+9) dL(l and x or x+19,y+1,l and x or x+19,y+8) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w = s.getWidth() h = s.getHeight() --fit = math.floor((w-12)/(wagon+1))
-- background setC(theme.bg2) dRF(0,0,w,h)
-- decouple button pDec = onTouch(d.w/2-22,48,44,9) and sDec if pDec then setC(theme.acc) dRF(w/2-22,48,44,9) setC(theme.bg2) else setC(sDec and theme.acc or theme.bg) dL(w/2-22,48,w/2-22,57) setC(sDec and theme.fg or theme.bg) end dT(w/2-19,50,"decouple")
-- left button setC(sLeft and (onTouch(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dTF(w/2-12,38,w/2-14,41,w/2-11,44) pLeft = onTouch(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) and sLeft
-- right button setC(sRight and (onTouch(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dTF(w/2+11,38,w/2+14,41,w/2+10,44) pRight = onTouch(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) and sRight
-- offset - position of the first car o = w/2-(detach+1-minD)*(wagon+1) if (detach == 0) then o = o-wagon/2 end if (detach == numWagons) then o = o+wagon/2+1 end
-- direction arrow setC(theme.fg) x = math.max(6,o+(1-minD)*(wagon+1)) dL(x,20,x+12,20) dL(x,20,x+3,17)
-- detach line setC(theme.acc) x = w/2 + (detach == 0 and -10 or detach == numWagons and 9 or -1) dL(x,36,x,41)
-- draw cars and line x = o for i=minD,maxD+1 do setC(i == myID and theme.acc or theme.fg) if i == 0 or i == numWagons+1 then --dnTCP(x,24,i == 0) elseif i == masterID then dLoco(x,24,i) else dCar(x,24,i) end x = x+(wagon+1) end end
function clamp(v,x,y) return math.min(math.max(v,x),y) end

c1.script:
colors={w={85,90,90},w2={70,75,75},b={10,10,10},b2={8,8,8},acc={69,12,10}} scroll = 0 wagon = 20 pNumWagons = 0
function touch(x,y,w,h) return t.x>=x and t.y>=y and t.x<x+w and t.y<y+h end function onTouch(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press end function onRelease(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and pre and not press end function onPress(x,y,w,h) return touch(x,y,w,h) and press and not pre end
function setC(v) sC(v[1],v[2],v[3]) end
gN=input.getNumber;gB=input.getBool;sN=output.setNumber;sB=output.setBool; function onTick() press = gB(1) d={w=gN(1),h=gN(2)} t={x=gN(3),y=gN(4)}
night = gB(3) nTCPFront = gB(7) nTCPRear = gB(8) --decouple = gB(4) numWagons = gN(7) masterID = gN(8) myID = gN(9)
if night then theme={bg=colors.b,bg2=colors.b2,fg=colors.w,acc=colors.acc} else theme={bg=colors.w,bg2=colors.w2,fg=colors.b,acc=colors.acc} end
minD = nTCPFront and 0 or 1 maxD = nTCPRear and numWagons or numWagons-1 numWagons2 = maxD - minD + 2 -- including non tcp cars
if not detach or updateDetach then detach = myID detach = clamp(detach,minD,maxD) end updateDetach = numWagons > pNumWagons -- reset position to my car
sDec = maxD >= minD or pDec sLeft = detach > minD or pLeft sRight = detach < maxD or pRight
if (onPress(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) or gB(5)) and detach > minD then detach = detach-1 end
if (onPress(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) or gB(6)) and detach < maxD then detach = detach+1 end
detach = clamp(detach,minD,maxD) -- is this necessary?
sN(1,detach+1) sB(1,onTouch(d.w/2-22,48,44,9)) sB(2,detach == myID or detach+1 == myID)
pNumWagons = numWagons pre = gB(1) end
function dLoco(x,y,n) dL(x+3,y,x+17,y) dL(x+3,y+8,x+17,y+8) dL(x,y+6,x+3,y+9) dL(x+17,y+8,x+20,y+5) dL(x,y+5,x+2,y+1) dL(x+18,y+2,x+20,y+6) dRF(x+2,y+1,1,1) dRF(x+17,y+1,1,1) dTB(x,y,20,9,math.floor(n),0,0) end
function dCar(x,y,n) dR(x,y,19,8) dTB(x,y,20,9,math.floor(n),0,0) setC(theme.bg2) dRF(x,y,1,1) dRF(x+19,y,1,1) end
function dnTCP(x,y,l) setC(theme.bg) dR(x,y,19,8) dTB(x,y,20,9,"x",0,0) setC(theme.bg2) dRF(l and x+19 or x,y,1,1) dR(l and x+3 or x+13,y-1,3,10) dL(l and x+1 or x+18,y,l and x+1 or x+18,y+9) dL(l and x or x+19,y+1,l and x or x+19,y+8) end
s=screen;sC=s.setColor;dTF=s.drawTriangleF;dR=s.drawRect;dRF=s.drawRectF;dT=s.drawText;dTB=s.drawTextBox;dL=s.drawLine; function onDraw() w = s.getWidth() h = s.getHeight() --fit = math.floor((w-12)/(wagon+1))
-- background setC(theme.bg2) dRF(0,0,w,h)
-- decouple button pDec = onTouch(d.w/2-22,48,44,9) and sDec if pDec then setC(theme.acc) dRF(w/2-22,48,44,9) setC(theme.bg2) else setC(sDec and theme.acc or theme.bg) dL(w/2-22,48,w/2-22,57) setC(sDec and theme.fg or theme.bg) end dT(w/2-19,50,"decouple")
-- left button setC(sLeft and (onTouch(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dTF(w/2-12,38,w/2-14,41,w/2-11,44) pLeft = onTouch(d.w/2-16,36,7,9) and sLeft
-- right button setC(sRight and (onTouch(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) and theme.acc or theme.fg) or theme.bg) dTF(w/2+11,38,w/2+14,41,w/2+10,44) pRight = onTouch(d.w/2+9,36,7,9) and sRight
-- offset - position of the first car o = w/2-(detach+1-minD)*(wagon+1) if (detach == 0) then o = o-wagon/2 end if (detach == numWagons) then o = o+wagon/2+1 end
-- direction arrow setC(theme.fg) x = math.max(6,o+(1-minD)*(wagon+1)) dL(x,20,x+12,20) dL(x,20,x+3,17)
-- detach line setC(theme.acc) x = w/2 + (detach == 0 and -10 or detach == numWagons and 9 or -1) dL(x,36,x,41)
-- draw cars and line x = o for i=minD,maxD+1 do setC(i == myID and theme.acc or theme.fg) if i == 0 or i == numWagons+1 then --dnTCP(x,24,i == 0) elseif i == masterID then dLoco(x,24,i) else dCar(x,24,i) end x = x+(wagon+1) end end
function clamp(v,x,y) return math.min(math.max(v,x),y) end
